JobTitle: Regional Operations Manager, Collections & Cashouts LatAm
JobFullDesc: About the RoleThe LatAm Collections & Cashouts team coordinates cash-related operations for our earners across the region. While our main focus today is on lowering our earners’ cash arrears, we also play a key role in streamlining and implementing new payout features for our earners. As such, this role will directly contribute to improving the company’s bottom line while also growing perceived value to users on our platform. What You’ll DoWork with data to improve collections processes and increase efficiencies in the enforcement of bad actors. Scale local standard methodologies across the region.Implement new cashout features across the region for our earnersQuickly tackle problems and mitigate issues that arise in our processes that could lead to heavy financial losses. Track performance against OKRsCoordinate Product tests, launches, and experiments across LatAm.Be a great partner with core Money related areas at Uber, including multiple Product teams, Business Development, Regional Operations and Marketing teams from other regions, Support, Functional teams (Policy, Communications, Legal and Transactions), Territory Teams, and 3rd Party Vendors.What You’ll NeedStrong SQL and Excel/Google Sheets proficiency is a mustPrevious experience in a role where data was analyzed to generate insights, which were then used to implement new processes or improve existing frameworksExperience leading multiple tasks/projects, being able to optimally prioritize them based on the business’ needs.Bachelor's degree with minimum 3 years of professional work experience in a related field (consulting, operations, strategy, analytics, tech, investment banking)
